text: int main ( ) { int t , n , s , d = 0 , max ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { max = INT_MIN ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ ( n * ( n + 1 ) ) / 2 ] , i , c = 1 , d = 1 , s ; for ( i = 0 ; i < ( n * ( n + 1 ) / 2 ) ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , a + i ) ; if ( n == 1 ) { scanf ( "%d\n" , a [ -- i ] ) ; continue ; } for ( i = 0 ; i <= ( n * ( n + 1 ) / 2 - 2 * n ) + 1 ; ) { s = a [ i ] + a [ i + c ] + a [ i + c + 1 ] ; if ( s >= max ) { max = s ; } if ( i > 0 ) i += c ; else i ++ ; c ++ ; } printf ( "%d\n" , max ) ; } return 0 ; }
